name: Combination Studios
tag_list: ios, android, html, app, mobile-apps, smartphone, enterprise-apps
overview: Combination Studios is a London-based enterprise-level mobile app development studio. We were founded in 2007 by a team with over 12 years of professional experience designing and developing award-winning iOS, Android and HTML5 mobile applications. Our experience spans mission critical systems for broadcast, financial, live events, telecoms and healthcare industries. We also have many years experience working with consumer brands and retail. We have a mature and experienced attitude to design and development and work with speed and efficiency. We forge lasting relationships with our clients; with the vast majority of new engagements made through our existing clients recommending us.
